data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Perkins, Philip D. (2004): A revision of the South African endemic humicolous beetle genus Nucleotops Perkins and Balfour­Browne (Coleoptera: Hydraenidae). Zootaxa 559: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157458
